resources.string: \t On Monday April 3rd, 2017 the President signed into law a bill that would prevent existing internet privacy regulations from continuing. This removes the restrictions blocking ISPs from being able to gather and sell data about your browsing history. Since I think this is a horrible idea, I have created this app. While a VPN is the best option,the second best option is to pollute your browsing data with false visits. Therefore you can use this app to set a specific time range which during that time, this app will visit random websites in the background resulting in false browsing history data. It\'s unfortunate that it\'s come to this but it has. Please note this will use your phone\'s data.
